attributes.action: stop airlines like ryanair discriminating against larger passengers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ryanair have announced they are introducing "fat tax". Apparently 1 in3 people have agreed with their plans and they are now taking votes on their website on how they should tax fat people, (their words, not mine). Other airlines are bound to follow! This is outright discrimination!
